commands: echo === Starting Zombie LoRA Adapter Training ===
echo Training 7 adapters: personality, dialogue_style, action_policy, emotional_response, world_knowledge, social_dynamics, goal_prioritization

for task in personality dialogue_style action_policy emotional_response world_knowledge social_dynamics goal_prioritization; do echo Training zombie_${task}...; python3 training/train_lora_adapter.py --archetype zombie --task $task 2>&1 | tee -a training-zombie-all.log; echo Completed zombie_${task}; done
